entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023
